title: Easy as 1, 2, 3 chicken pie
ingredients: ['1 onion, roughly chopped', '1 carrot, roughly chopped', '1/2 packet bacon', '15g butter', '1 splash vegetable oil', '30g plain flour', '250ml chicken stock', '120ml milk', '2 large cooked chicken breast fillets', '1 packet puff pastry sheets', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
